definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: An artist makes a papercut portrait of US President Obama at the Yu Gardens in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海豫園，藝術家在製作剪紙的奧巴馬頭像。

sentences.english: Could the Olmec heads depict African visitors from across the Atlantic?
sentences.chinese: 歐梅克頭像是描述成功走過大西洋而來的非洲人嗎？

sentences.english: You have to know how to go about getting the right photo-shoot, the headshots.
sentences.chinese: 你要知道怎麼有好的拍攝，頭像照片。

sentences.english: Option to not load avatar pictures in posts.
sentences.chinese: 選擇不加載職位頭像圖片。

sentences.english: Attach a small picture of your face to outgoing messages.
sentences.chinese: 使發送的郵件附加上您的頭像圖片。

sentences.english: It's already a growing format for movies including the blockbuster Avatar.
sentences.chinese: 它已經越來越多的格式爲影片包括頭像。

sentences.english: The figure belongs to one of the colossi of the facade.
sentences.chinese: 該頭像屬於神殿正面的一尊巨像。

sentences.english: Added avatar images to the scoreboards.
sentences.chinese: 在記分牌加頭像的圖像。

sentences.english: An artist displays woodcut portraits of US President Obama at the Yu Gardens in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海豫園，藝術家在出售木雕的奧巴馬頭像作品。

sentences.english: His picture is on the 20-dollar bill.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭像被印在20美元上面。

sentences.english: Set the picture become your profile picture.
sentences.chinese: 將生成的圖片設置爲您的頭像。

sentences.english: On an American One Hundred Dollar Bill, There is a portrait of which American statesman?
sentences.chinese: 美國人的百元大鈔是富裕的象徵，上面的頭像是誰？

sentences.english: Drag a picture file into your avatar area to change it as well.
sentences.chinese: 拖動圖片到你的頭像區域文件，以更改它。

sentences.english: You will also need to enable your avatar for it to be displayed with your posts.
sentences.chinese: 同樣您可能需要在您的個人設置中開啓頭像顯示。

sentences.english: Alpoy – an online tool that can make avatar and animate picture for you.
sentences.chinese: 一個在線工具，可爲你製作頭像和動畫圖片。

sentences.english: He sketched a boy's head on the sketchpad .
sentences.chinese: 他在速寫簿上畫出了男孩頭像素描。

definition: original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
upstairs/(Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
to stand in a circle and watch
